tentangKami.title: About Us
tentangKami.p1: <0>DragonsOof</0> is an Indonesian Minecraft server that has been operating since 2022. Built and developed by <1>DragonFix</1> and his team, DragonsOof has grown into a community striving to provide the best gameplay experience for players.
tentangKami.p2: Now, DragonsOof offers two main gamemode options: <0>Survival</0> and <1>Skyblock</1>, designed with exclusive systems and features to enhance the challenge and excitement of playing.

description.part1: Survival isn't boring anymore! Enjoy features like
description.part2: in a 24/7 living world. Build, survive, and become a legend!

features.title: Our Server's Featured Features
features.desc: We bring you a fun, safe, and fair Minecraft survival experience for all players!

list.title: Global Event
list.desc: Experience epic adventures with big events full of challenges and rare rewards!

list.title: Crossplatform (Java & Bedrock)
list.desc: Play together without limits! Java and Bedrock users can play together on our server.

list.title: RPG Wannabe
list.desc: Level up, unlock skills, and progress like a real RPG game!

list.title: Land Protect
list.desc: Protect your land from griefers! Easy and safe land claim system.

list.title: Custom World
list.desc: Explore uniquely designed worlds with stunning biomes you've never seen before!

list.title: Immersive Gameplay
list.desc: From dynamic economy to social interaction â€” Minecraft world feels alive!

list.title: Brand New Experience
list.desc: A fresh breakthrough with innovative plugins and mechanics that change how you play Minecraft!

list.title: Voice Chat & EmoteCraft
list.desc: Communicate and express freely using Voice Chat & EmoteCraft mods!
